cells.data:
## Softening 
- [ ] 10% sodium
- [ ] 10% potatssium hydroxide
- [ ] 25% boiling hypochlorite

### Aviod Hardening Compounds

Ethonal, acidified dichromate, mercuric chloride, Xylene, or chromic acid.

In addition prolonged exposure to parraffin could be a problem. 

Instead of ethonal use 
- [ ] n-butyl or t butyl
